roles.name: Vanguard
roles.description: Frontline anchor that absorbs pressure and holds space.

roles.name: Defender
roles.description: Protects allies through mitigation, peel, or bodyguard play.

roles.name: Bruiser
roles.description: Durable brawler that trades well in extended fights.

roles.name: Striker
roles.description: Primary damage dealer focused on securing takedowns.

roles.name: Assassin
roles.description: Burst-focused eliminator that punishes mistakes and low HP.

roles.name: Skirmisher
roles.description: Mobile fighter that trades, disengages, and re-engages.

roles.name: Artillery
roles.description: Long-range pressure and zone control from the backline.

roles.name: Controller
roles.description: Tempo control through crowd control, debuffs, and denial.

roles.name: Support
roles.description: Enables allies with healing, buffs, and utility.

roles.name: Summoner
roles.description: Leans on minions, constructs, or companions to apply pressure.
